com.threecrickets.prudence.cache
Interface Cache

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChainCache, FakeCache, H2Cache, HazelcastCache, InProcessMemoryCache, MemcachedCache, MongoDbCache, SqlCache
public interface Cache

An interface for cache backends to be used with GeneratedTextResource .

Ideas for places to store cache entries: in-process memory, the filesystem, databases, and dedicated network services.

Note: implementations must be thread-safe.

Author:
Tal Liron
See Also:
CacheEntry

 CacheEntry fetch(String key)

Method Detail

store

void store(String key,
           CacheEntry entry)
Stores an entry in the cache. The entry is guaranteed to be un-fetchable after CacheEntry.getExpirationDate(), although it may very well be un-fetchable sooner.

Keys are unique to the cache. Storing for a key that already exists will replace the entry if it exists.

Parameters:
key - A key unique to the cache
entry - The entry

fetch

CacheEntry fetch(String key)
Fetches an entry from the cache if it's there and has not yet expired.

Parameters:
key - A key unique to the cache
Returns:
An entry or null

invalidate

void invalidate(String tag)
Makes sure that all tagged entries are un-fetchable.

Parameters:
tag -

prune

void prune()
Removes expired cache entries.

reset

void reset()
Removes all entries in the cache.
